about_the_game:
Carry On a Hero's Will!

Shieldbound is a hand-drawn, 2D action-adventure metroidvania with a unique twist where you use your shield to do everything from platforming to combat. Set in colorful and cartoony world, filled to the brim with lively characters and vibrant environments in contrast with the souls-like formula.

Explore a massive world with interconnected areas such as a lush green cave system overrun by the wind, a vibrant and welcoming village built on top of a river, an underground castle ruled by dragon and many more. All in hopes to find your way to the top of the mysterious pillar towering above all.

Use the powers of your spirit-bound shield to dash, bounce and dive your way through fast paced platforming and puzzle challenges.

Customize your loadout and forge your own playstyle as you discover more and more abilities and upgrades with 50 unique items allowing many possible combinations.

Fight your inner demons infused with your memories in over the top, action-packed, difficult boss fights with exhilarating music.

Talk with the folks to take on dozens of side-quests, filled with funny and charming interactions.
